simplesect.para: This struct maintains the state of an individual neuron.The neuron struct contains the parameters needed to maintain state in the neuron, along with references to output commands (dendrites).

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para: Each parameter contained within Cassidy2013}Preissl2012}Amir2013}'s models of Neuromporphic design that operate with the neuron are contained within this struct. Consider this struct a proto-object, just sans functions.
